extendedInfo.description: Test your reflex in this jumpy game. Guide a ball through 3D maze featuring colorful and smooth 3d graphics."Prism 3D stands out for its bright, attractive approach" - PocketGamer.co.uk"The game has beautiful graphics, is incredibly smooth" - AndroidCentral.com"Prism 3D is amazingly fun, addictive and best of all skillfully challenging" - AndroidTapp.com--25 levelsinfinite modelevel editor with online level sharing

reviews.title: Great job! This a make a game prism 3d
reviews.comment: Great and Creative to make us level editor Great this be creative and succes to make us this with lot of XP.. And now This game excellent this game rate 5 this game \342\210\232 \302\241s great game..
reviews.author: Elias Zachry

reviews.title: What Happened!!!!
reviews.comment: You have made 2 of the best games in the market. I have had them on my phone for years. Speedx 3D is my favorite. I just got a new phone and went to install it again and you just took it off the market within the last few days. Why??? I want it back on my phone. Please list it again.!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Frustrating. I love it.
reviews.comment: The amazing, beautiful graphics aside, this keeps me coming back for more bouncing ball. very addictive!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: \"Flat\"
reviews.comment: Really love it. But it would be much more awesome when some tiles are higher and some tiles are lower than normal tiles. And if you are moving backwards, the camera won\'t follow.What\'s up with these forcing tiles? In the level editor i put them to force right, but when i open up my level they\'re forcing me to left! Please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fun would gice 5 stars but keeps forceclosing, so UNINSTALLING!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please fix!
reviews.comment: I really love this game, but after the last update it keeps freezing up my phone and I have to force close. Will give 5 stars when this it\'s fixed! Also, I\'ve uploaded levels but don\'t see them available for others to download...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Grand
reviews.comment: Loving this.. addictive game...
reviews.author: Kaustubh Shetty

reviews.comment: Love it. Very fun game to play. Just wish there was a way i could delete any of the levels i downloaded.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool game
reviews.comment: Its a good game like speedx but please make other awesome games also please let us play all the levels uploaded not only the level that have best rating thx
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sensitivity sucks moto photon
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t matter where i set the sensitivity it still doesn\'t respond the way i want it to. I\'m constantly holding my phone at ridiculous angles and it still doesn\'t respond. If not for that I\'d love it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Idea rather than complaint
reviews.comment: I love the game graphics and the music. However,  I would recommend allowing the game to be viewed, and played in landscape mode. Have a great day
reviews.author: Chris Laughlin

reviews.comment: Very interesting game recommended for download
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy s 2
reviews.comment: Very nice game... Finally done with all 25 stages!!!!

reviews.title: I love you games!!!!
reviews.comment: You have made the two best games on the market. Please make more Free apps. I reccomed them to my friends all the time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really good, even on my older phone. Select the appropriate sensitivity in the options menu. On my Xperia x8 using sensitivity around 7 works great.

reviews.title: Awesome!
